item.title: 贸易商等待美俄会谈结果，欧洲天然气价格回落
item.description: 由于交易商在等待美国和俄罗斯官员在沙特阿拉伯举行的会谈结果，欧洲天然气价格有所回落。【原文：European natural gas prices eased as traders await results of talks between US and Russian officials in Saudi Arabia, which lasted for about 12 hours.】

item.title: 壳牌押宝液化天然气，提高股东回报率
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）表示，将通过巩固其世界顶级液化天然气贸易商的地位，在本十年结束前提高投资者回报。【原文：Shell Plc said it would boost investor returns through the end of this decade by reinforcing its position as the world’s top trader of liquefied natural gas.】

item.title: 拉扎德与 Lemssouguer's Arini 合作开展欧洲直接借贷业务
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：Lazard Inc. has agreed a deal to work with Arini Capital Management on direct lending investments across Europe, the Middle East and Africa, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: Kirkbi和Lightrock加入医疗应用Amboss 2.4亿欧元的投资行列
item.description: Kirkbi、Lightrock 和 M&G Investments 加入了德国医疗初创企业 Amboss 的 2.4 亿欧元（2.6 亿美元）融资回合，成为这家为医疗保健专业人员提供副驾驶服务的软件供应商的主要投资者。【原文：Kirkbi, Lightrock and M&G Investments joined a €240 million ($260 million) financing round into German medical startup Amboss as primary investors in the software provider that offers co-pilot services for health-care professionals.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望连续第四天下跌
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团总部办公室。摄影师：Luke MacGregor/Bloomberg【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group Plc headquarter offices in London. Photographer: Luke MacGregor/Bloomberg】

item.title: 石场计划在大选前采取 "强有力的 "通胀措施
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，日本首相石破茂正计划采取 "强有力的 "措施，以缓解物价上涨对消费者造成的影响。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is planning “powerful” measures to ease the impact on consumers coming from price hikes, according to local media reports.】

item.title: 印度股市反弹突破技术障碍
item.description: 印度股市本月的反弹势头强劲，突破了众多技术指标。【原文：The rally in Indian equities this month has steamrolled through numerous technical indicators as it gains momentum.】

item.title: 百事可乐将收购四个品牌，进军非洲 462 家门店
item.description: Pepkor Holdings Ltd. 将从 Retailability Proprietary Ltd. 手中收购服装和家居用品品牌 Legit、Swagga、Style 和 Boardmans，从而使非洲最大的服装零售商在非洲大陆南部增加 462 家门店。【原文：Pepkor Holdings Ltd. will buy clothing and homeware brands Legit, Swagga, Style and Boardmans from Retailability Proprietary Ltd., giving Africa’s largest apparel retailer access to 462 more stores across the south of the continent.】

item.title: 银行业后起之秀以创纪录的 7000 万美元买下新加坡豪宅
item.description: 支持马来西亚最大银行之一的一个家族的子孙以创纪录的每平方英尺价格买下了新加坡的一座豪宅。【原文：A Singapore luxury mansion has been purchased at a record price per square foot by a scion of the family which backs one of Malaysia’s largest banks.】

item.title: 印度将维持食糖出口配额，因为供应充足
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，印度计划维持本榨季 100 万吨的食糖出口配额，这缓解了人们对可能出现的供应限制的担忧，上周全球食糖价格因此上涨。【原文：India plans to maintain its one-million-ton sugar export quota for the current season, according to a person familiar with the matter, easing worries about possible supply restrictions that lifted global prices last week.】

item.title: 贝莱德在欧洲首次推出比特币交易所交易产品
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc., the world’s largest asset manager, is launching a Bitcoin exchanged-traded product in Europe, following the success of its $48 billion US fund tracking the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 韩国将加强矿产回收以应对中美贸易风险
item.description: 随着中美贸易紧张局势的加剧，韩国面临着供应的不确定性，韩国的目标是到 2030 年实现 20% 的战略关键矿物回收率。【原文：South Korea aims to achieve a 20% recycling rate for strategic critical minerals by 2030, as intensifying trade tensions between the US and China expose the country to supply uncertainties.】

item.title: 特斯拉董事长登霍尔姆无视有关马斯克工作重心的所有问题
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.主席罗宾-登霍尔姆（Robyn Denholm）对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）是否需要为这家美国汽车制造商投入更多时间的问题置若罔闻，因为这家公司的销售和股价都在下滑。【原文：Tesla Inc. Chair Robyn Denholm ignored questions about whether Elon Musk needs to devote more time to the US carmaker as its sales and share price crater.】

item.title: 匈牙利将在瓦尔加首次会议上维持利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利央行准备在行长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）领导下的首次政策会议上继续维持利率不变，投资者密切关注在通胀加速的情况下是否会改变指导原则。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is poised to continue holding interest rates at the first policy meeting under Governor Mihaly Varga, with investors closely watching for any shift in guidance in the face of accelerating inflation.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲的业绩持续低迷，二月份下滑 40
item.description: 在过去 12 个月中，特斯拉公司在欧洲的销量有 10 个月出现下滑，这家汽车制造商在今年年初陷入了困境。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s sales have fallen in 10 of the last 12 months in Europe, with the carmaker struggling mightily at the beginning of this year.】

item.title: 中国建筑商融创进入第二次海外重组
item.description: 融创中国控股有限公司（Sunac China Holdings Ltd.）是最早完成离岸重组的中国大型开发商之一，随着越来越多的建筑商在长期的房地产危机中面临持续的流动性问题，该公司正重新开始重组进程。【原文：Sunac China Holdings Ltd., one of the first major Chinese developers to complete an offshore restructuring, is starting the process all over again, as it joins a growing number of builders facing persistent liquidity problems amid a prolonged property crisis.】

item.title: 作为重组的一部分，TikTok 广告主管下台
item.description: 作为重组的一部分，TikTok 负责核心广告业务的一位高管即将离职，这是公司在 4 月 5 日达成美国出售协议的最后期限前发生的最新管理层变动。【原文：A TikTok executive responsible for its core advertising business is stepping aside as part of a reorganization, the latest management change at the company facing an April 5 deadline to reach a US sale deal.】

item.title: 中国人民银行的新贷款定价可能会降低银行成本
item.description: 中国央行为一年期政策性贷款定价的新方式可能会导致贷款人的融资成本隐性下降，从而缓解近几个月来由于流动性收紧而导致市场借贷利率升高的压力。【原文：The Chinese central bank’s new way to price its one-year policy loans may lead to a stealth reduction in funding costs for lenders, easing their pressure from elevated market borrowing rates in recent months as liquidity tightened.】

item.title: 土耳其财政大臣将会见投资者以缓解里拉压力
item.description: 土耳其财政部长将于周二与外国投资者举行一次电话会议，这是土耳其政府在一位重要反对派人士被捕引发动荡之后为安抚市场所做的最新尝试。【原文：Turkey’s finance minister is set to hold a call with foreign investors on Tuesday, the latest attempt by the government to calm markets after the tumult triggered by a key opposition figure’s arrest.】

item.title: 小米、比亚迪 110 亿美元售股显示香港交易回暖
item.description: 本月，两家电动汽车制造商利用全球最大的市场反弹之一，在香港发行了自 2021 年以来规模最大的两只股票。【原文：Hong Kong’s two biggest stock offerings since 2021 came this month after a pair of electric-vehicle makers took advantage of one of the world’s biggest market rallies.】

item.title: 在 Indeed 上搜索工作机会的人数在平等机会办公室目标员工中激增
item.description: Indeed Hiring Lab 的一项新研究显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统收缩联邦官僚机构的运动引发了目标机构工作人员的求职热潮。【原文：President Donald Trump’s campaign to shrink the federal bureaucracy has triggered a wave of job-hunting by workers at targeted agencies, according to a new study by Indeed Hiring Lab.】

item.title: 中国的 DeepSeek 在与 OpenAI 的竞争中发布最新进展
item.description: DeepSeek 发布了其 V3 型号的更新，承诺提供更好的编程能力，凸显了这家中国人工智能初创公司领先竞争对手一步的意图。【原文：DeepSeek released updates to its V3 model that promise to deliver better programming capabilities, underscoring the Chinese AI startup’s intent to remain a step ahead of competitors.】

item.title: 特朗普施压委内瑞拉，中国炼油企业再遭重创
item.description: 由于特朗普政府对委内瑞拉石油和天然气的任何买家征收 25% 的关税，长期以来饱受产能过剩和利润微薄困扰的中国民营炼油企业再次面临挫折。【原文：China’s private refiners, long plagued by excess capacity and paper-thin margins, are facing yet another setback as the Trump administration imposes a 25% tariff on any buyer of Venezuelan oil and gas.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行认为四月份降息的可能性很大
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）周二表示，菲律宾央行 "很有可能 "在 4 月份将利率下调 25 个基点。【原文：The Philippine central bank has a “good chance” of cutting its interest rate by 25 basis points in April, Governor Eli Remolona said Tuesday.】

item.title: 外国人今年首周转为印度股票买家
item.description: 随着印度经济复苏步伐的加快，全球基金自 12 月以来首次每周买入印度股票。【原文：Global funds have turned buyers of Indian equities on a weekly basis for the first time since December, as a nascent recovery picks up pace.】

item.title: 阿斯利康希望通过北京研发中心摆脱中国调查
item.description: 自从阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）10 月份传出其中国区负责人正在接受调查的消息，令投资者感到震惊以来，这家英国制药巨头一直试图在其第二大市场保持一切照旧的姿态。【原文：Ever since AstraZeneca Plc shocked investors in October with news its China chief was under investigation, the British pharmaceutical giant has tried to maintain a business-as-usual stance in its second-biggest market.】

item.title: 政府承诺后中国部分钢铁企业减产
item.description: 据 Mysteel 报道，由于供应过剩和利润率低，中国一些钢厂已开始减产。【原文：Some Chinese steel mills have begun cutting production, according to Mysteel, as a supply glut and low profitability weigh on the industry.】

item.title: 澳大利亚超级基金首席信息官称基金可应对特朗普的关税冲击
item.description: 澳大利亚养老金公司（AustralianSuper）的投资总监对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战引发的波动表示担忧，尽管该国的养老金行业仍在大量投资全球股票。【原文：The investment chief of AustralianSuper brushed off concerns about volatility sparked by US President Donald Trump’s trade wars, even as the country’s pension industry maintains its massive exposure to global stocks.】

item.title: 中国科技股跌幅超过 3%，临近调整
item.description: 由于小米公司出售股票以及各大公司的一系列负面新闻打击了市场情绪，中国科技股出现下滑。【原文：Chinese technology stocks slumped as Xiaomi Corp’s share sale and a slew of negative headlines from major companies hurt sentiment.】
